info.title: User Management API
info.description: An API for managing users, roles, and authentication sessions.

post.description: Authenticate a user with a username and password. Creates a new session token and returns detailed session information.

schema.title: Response Api Auth Login Api V1 Auth Token Post

get.description: Return the current authentication sessions details, including token and user information.

schema.title: Response Api Auth Status Api V1 Auth Status Get

get.description: Logout the current user session, invalidating the session token.
For administrative users: Retrieve a list of all active sessions with detailed session information.
For administrators only: Logout a specific session identified by its token.
List all roles in the system.

schema.title: Response Api Roles Api V1 Roles Get

get.description: Get a specific role by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific role by its ID.

put.description: Update a specific role by its ID.

post.description: Create a new role with specified endpoints.

get.description: List all users in the system.

schema.title: Response Api Users Api V1 Users Get

post.description: Create a new user in the system.

put.description: Set roles for a user. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Delete a user. Requires admin privileges.

get.description: List all API keys for a specific user.

schema.title: Response Api List Apikeys Api V1 User  User Id  Apikeys Get

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Api List Own Apikeys Api V1 User Apikeys Get

get.description: Get a specific API key for a user.

delete.description: Delete a specific API key for a user.

get.description: Get one of *your* API keys (user_id from session).

post.description: Create a new API key for a specific user.
Create a new API key for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response List Endpoints Api V1 Endpoints Get

post.description: Handle WebRTC offer and return an answer.
Start recording for a specific peer.

delete.description: Stop recording for a specific peer.

get.description: Catch-all route that serves the Next.js application's HTML files for any unspecified path.
